channel.title: Life on Lightly Caffeinated
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Lightly Caffeinated

item.title: Homology is DEI?
item.description: Funding Uncertainty # Over the past few months, the current government has taken a hammer to scientific funding in the form of several proposals to cut federal grants.

item.title: A sort of state of the department at UT
item.description: Recently an external review committee (ERC) has commented on the state of the department and proposed possible solutions, or at least places where the department should look into.

item.title: Making Coffee
item.description: Unnecessary Intro # Almost everyday, usually in the afternoon, either back at home or in the office, I make an iced pour over.

item.title: Coffee in Austin
item.description: It seems I will be here for a while, so I might as well make a list of all the coffee shops I’ve been to.
